Package atg.userdirectory.droplet

Class Summary
CreateOrganizationFormHandler This formhandler is used to create a new organization in the user directory.
HasFunction This droplet is used to query whether or not a user has a particular function associated with them.
TargetPrincipalsDroplet This Droplet extends the PrincipalsDroplet to retrieve a list of Targeted Principals for a specific Principal associated with the user.
UserListDroplet This Droplet is used to retrieve a list of User Principals for a particular Organization whose organizationId is passed in as an input parameter.
ViewPrincipalsDroplet This Droplet is used to retrieve a list of Principals for a particular user whose userId is passed in as one of the input parameters.
